attributes.action: Increase the power limit for UK radio amateurs from 400 watts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
UK amateurs are limited to 400 watts output.other EU countries are allowed
upto 1000 watts which makes it an uneven playingfeild as in contests.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Increase the power limit for UK radio amateurs from 400 watts."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12992.asp

Prime Minister's Office
